title: Clients Can Take Their Business Anywhere
description: Kimberlee Orth, Barron's top-ranked woman advisor, tells me that her business is about much more than asset allocation. Find out why she's wearing office clothes every day, what she says to every client, and why she's not worried about the election.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Kimberlee Orth, Barron's top-ranked woman advisor, tells me that her business is about much more than asset allocation. Find out why she's wearing office clothes every day, what she says to every client, and why she's not worried about the election.
